A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Wow!! So much to unpack. I will say this - if you liked the prequels\, you won't love this one. This is much deeper\, with a lot of challenging conventional themes that previous SW movies\, particularly the prequels\, held. I can see how prequel fans don't love this one.

But\, even then\, this is a deeper movie than Empire.

All that said\, it is not dark like Empire. There is hope. There is a ton of levity. The old characters are well serviced. The new ones grow.

I take one star off because\, as many mentioned\, there is a chunk of it\, a storyline that could have been simplified greatly\, or removed\, and it would have been a much tighter movie.

That said\, it wasn't enough to ruin the movie. It is something I need to see again\, to really delve into more\, and I will.

Again\, I get the negative reviews from some. If you are looking for some easy\, shallow\, simple good v evil story\, this is not it. If you are looking for something more like Empire\, that challenges notions of good\, evil\, and heroes\, but still leaves you feeling like there is hope\, then you"ll love it.
